name: Heists & Heights
description:
Can you reach the top of the bank and claim your loot?

Be careful! The bank wall is full of traps, it won't be easy.

How to play:

 Hold L click button for direction pointer, release to climb the wall. When you run out of stamina, you start falling, L click to grab the wall again. Avoid the traps and reach the top as fast as you can.

Warning!

For speedrunning and better experience in general, I recommend the downloadable version. The online leaderboard doesn't work on the HTML5 version :( So, if you want to submit your score, try the windows version instead.

A game developed by Spyridon Glarakis (Opossum In A Jar) for SpeedJam#1 (THIEVERY) hosted by  ScoreSpace.

Code by Spyridon Glarakis

Music & Sound Design By Spyridon Glarakis  

Art by Maria Tranta & Spyridon Glarakis

Game Design By Spyridon Glarakis & Maria Tranta

Special Thanks: Maria Tranta & Scorespace
